/usr/bin/c++  -std=c++1y -lglfw -lGL -lOpenGL -lGLEW -pthread -lfreetype   CMakeFiles/voxel-world.dir/source/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/voxel-world.dir/source/rendering/context-creation.cpp.o CMakeFiles/voxel-world.dir/source/rendering/rendering.cpp.o CMakeFiles/voxel-world.dir/source/rendering/Camera/Camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/voxel-world.dir/source/Helpers/wavefront-loader.cpp.o  -o voxel-world
